concept.title: Upgrading docfacto rumtime
concept.shortdesc: How to upgrade the docfacto runtime

section.p: To upgrade an existing docfacto installation, a new installation should first be done. This will create a new folder with the release numbers appended to it. If installing the same release, then you must take care to backup the Docfacto.xml as this will be over written. Once you have installed the new release, then you must merge the changes that you have made to the existing Docfacto.xml and modify the new Docfacto.xml. All plugins must then be configured to reflect the new file location of the Docfacto.xml.
